name: Unblock: The Parking
description: Puzzle game about car parking. Move poorly parked cars to unlock your way to the exit.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Core2Duo Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: QuadCore Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 or better Storage: 200 MB available space
